publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2239 Brian Adam: Parental Responsibilty-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to consider allowing the courts to hold parents liable in respect of damage caused by their children.
S1M-2239 Brian Adam: Parental Responsibility-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to consider allowing the courts to hold parents liable in respect of damage caused by their children.
S1M-2239 Parental Responsibility (lodged on 20 September 2001) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*

S1M-2239 Brian Adam: Parental Responsibility-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to consider allowing the courts to hold parents liable in respect of damage caused by their children. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh
